dsOverview.title: Mean hydrographic analyses of the North Atlantic, by Fukumori

summary.p: Hydrography analysis for the North Atlantic ocean including temperature, salinity, oxygen, phosphate, nitrate, and silicate. Based on data from 1981-1985.
